function exportBackup() {
  const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
  const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');
  
  const backup = {
    version: '2024.12.22',
    exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
    templates: templates,
    settings: settings
  };

  const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
  const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
  const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);
  
  const now = new Date();
  const filename = `cac-backup-${
    now.getFullYear()
  }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
    String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
  }-${
    String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
  }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
    String(now. getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
  }.json`;

  const link = document.createElement('a');
  link.href = url;
  link.download = filename;
  document.body.appendChild(link);
  link.click();
  document.body.removeChild(link);
  URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

  console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
  alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
}

function importBackup(file) {
  return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
    const reader = new FileReader();
    
    reader.onload = (e) => {
      try {
        const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);
        
        if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
          throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
        }

        // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
        localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
        localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

        console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
        alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates.length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);
        
        resolve({ success: true, backup });
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
        alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
        reject(error);
      }
    };

    reader.onerror = (e) => {
      console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
      reject(e);
    };

    reader.readAsText(file);
  });
}

(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac. templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');
    
    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);
    
    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();
      
      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);
          
          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);
          
          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac. templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {

          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

(function() {

  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

   - ìë™ì™„ì„± ë¡œì§ì—ëŠ” ì˜í–¥ ì—†ìŒ
========================= */
function createStore(initial){
  let state = initial;
  const subs = new Set();
  return {
    get: ()=>state,
    set: (next)=>{
      state = (typeof next==='function') ? next(state) : next;
      subs.forEach(fn=>fn(state));
    },
    update: (patch)=>{ state = {...state, ...patch}; subs.forEach(fn=>fn(state)); },
    subscribe: (fn)=>{ subs.add(fn); return ()=>subs.delete(fn); }
  };
}

    const jsonBtn = btn('âš™ ì„¤ì • - í…œí”Œë¦¿ JSON í¸ì§‘ ëª¨ë“œë¡œ ì „í™˜í•˜ê¸°',()=>{

    const s = store.get().settings;

      label('ë„ì–´ì“°ê¸° ì‚­ì œ í™•ë¥  (% ë‹¨ìœ„):'), ws,
      label('ì—°ì†í•œ ììŒ/ëª¨ìŒ ë° íŠ¹ìˆ˜ë¬¸ì ì‚­ì œ í™•ë¥  (% ë‹¨ìœ„):'), con,
      label('ì¿¨íƒ€ì„ (ì´ˆ ë‹¨ìœ„, ìµœì†Œ 2ì´ˆ):'), cool,
      label('ìë™ì™„ì„± íŒì—… Xì¢Œí‘œ (px ë‹¨ìœ„, ìŒìˆ˜ëŠ” ì™¼ìª½, ì–‘ìˆ˜ëŠ” ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½, -400~0 ì‚¬ì´ì˜ ê°’ì„ ê¶Œì¥):'), x,
      label('ìë™ì™„ì„± íŒì—… Yì¢Œí‘œ (px ë‹¨ìœ„, ìŒìˆ˜ëŠ” ì™¼ìª½, ì–‘ìˆ˜ëŠ” ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½, -400~0 ì‚¬ì´ì˜ ê°’ì„ ê¶Œì¥):'), y,

/* =========================
   ìë™ì™„ì„± ë¡œì§ (ì ˆëŒ€ ë³€ê²½ ì—†ìŒ)
========================= */
function initAutoComplete(input, ui){
  if(!input||!ui) return;

  let list=[]; let sel=0;
  const getText=()=> input.value ?? input.innerText ?? '';
  const setText=t=>{ ('value' in input) ? (input.value=t) : (input.innerText=t); };

  const render=()=>{
    if(!list.length){ ui.popup.style.display='none'; return; }
    ui.popup.innerHTML = list.map((s,i)=>`<div class="ac-item ${i===sel?'sel':''}">${s}</div>`).join('');
    ui.popup.style.display='flex';
  };

  const onInput=()=>{
    const v=(getText()||'').trim();
    if(!v){ ui.popup.style.display='none'; return; }
    const tpls=readTemplates();
    const candidates=tpls.flatMap(t=>(t.text||'').split(/\n+/).filter(Boolean));
    list=candidates.filter(s=>s.startsWith(v)&&s!==v).slice(0,10);
    sel=0; render();
  };

  const onKeyDown=e=>{
    const v=(getText()||'');
    if(e.key==='Escape'){ ui.popup.style.display='none'; return; }
    if(ui.popup.style.display==='none') return;
    if(e.key==='ArrowDown'){ e.preventDefault(); sel=(sel+1)%list.length; render(); }
    else if(e.key==='ArrowUp'){ e.preventDefault(); sel=(sel-1+list.length)%list.length; render(); }
    else if(e.key==='Enter' || e.key==='Tab'){
      if(list.length){ e.preventDefault(); setText(list[sel]); ui.popup.style.display='none'; }
    }
  };

  input.addEventListener('input', onInput);
  input.addEventListener('keydown', onKeyDown);
}

/* =========================
   ë¶€íŒ… (ì„ íƒì/ë¡œì§ ìœ ì§€)
========================= */
function boot(){
  const WRAP_SELECTORS=['.input_chat','#chat_write','#chatting_area .input_chat'];
  const INPUT_SELECTORS=['#write_area[contenteditable="true"]','#write_area[contenteditable]','div[contenteditable="true"]','[role="textbox"]','textarea'];
  const q=(sels,scope=document)=>{ for(const s of sels){ const el=scope.querySelector(s); if(el) return el; } return null; };

  let attached=false;
  const tryAttach=()=>{
    if(attached) return;
    const wrap=q(WRAP_SELECTORS, document) || document.body;
    const input=q(INPUT_SELECTORS, wrap) || q(INPUT_SELECTORS, document);
    if(!wrap || !input) return;

    const ui=mountUI(wrap);
    initAutoComplete(input, ui);  // â† ìë™ì™„ì„± ë¡œì§ ì—°ê²° (ë³€ê²½ ê¸ˆì§€)

    attached=true;
  };

  const poll=setInterval(()=>{ tryAttach(); if(attached) clearInterval(poll); }, 700);
  const mo=new MutationObserver(()=>tryAttach());
  mo.observe(document.documentElement, {childList:true,subtree:true});
  setTimeout(()=>clearInterval(poll), 20000);
}
boot();

(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  // ===== 3. CSS (ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) =====
  GM_addStyle(`
#backup-export-btn, #backup-import-btn {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
  border-radius: 6px;
  background: rgba(56,58,62,0.8);
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  user-select: none;
  transition: background 0.2s;
  font-weight: bold;
}
#backup-export-btn:hover, #backup-import-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(79,82,88,0.9);
}
#backup-export-btn:active, #backup-import-btn:active {
  background: rgba(91,94,101,0.9);
}
  `);

  // ===== 4. ë¶€íŒ… =====
  console.log('[CAC] Initializing with Backup/Restore feature.. .');
  addBackupButtonsToSettings();

#autocomplete_popup {
	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);

	height: max-content;
	max-height: 150px;
	overflow: hidden scroll;
	z-index: 9;
	background: rgb(56,58,62);
	border-radius: 12px;
}
.autocomplete_item {
	padding: 8px 28px;
	line-height: normal;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}

	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}

	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}

    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader.readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane. appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== í”Œë«í¼ ê°ì§€ =====
  const isChzzk = location.hostname.includes('chzzk. naver.com');
  const isSoop = location.hostname.includes('sooplive.co.kr');

  if (! isChzzk && !isSoop) return;

  console.log(`[CAC] Platform detected: ${isChzzk ? 'Chzzk' : 'SOOP'}`);

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2025.12.01',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()). padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console.error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader.readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  // ===== 3. CSS =====
  GM_addStyle(`
#backup-export-btn, #backup-import-btn {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
  border-radius: 6px;
  background: rgba(56,58,62,0.8);
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  user-select: none;
  transition: background 0.2s;

}
#backup-export-btn:hover, #backup-import-btn:hover {

}
#backup-export-btn:active, #backup-import-btn:active {
  background: rgba(91,94,101,0.9);
}
  `);

  console.log('[CAC] Backup/Restore feature initialized');
  addBackupButtonsToSettings();

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button. left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button. selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane. right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(. 2,1,. 5,. 95);
	transition-duration: . 2s;
}

function createStore(initial){

/* =========================

function initAutoComplete(input, ui){
  if(!input||!ui) return;

  let list=[]; let sel=0;
  const getText=()=> input.value ?? input.innerText ?? '';
  const setText=t=>{ ('value' in input) ? (input.value=t) : (input.innerText=t); };

  const render=()=>{
    if(!list.length){ ui.popup.style.display='none'; return; }
    ui.popup.innerHTML = list.map((s,i)=>`<div class="ac-item ${i===sel?'sel':''}">${s}</div>`).join('');
    ui.popup.style.display='flex';
  };

  const onInput=()=>{
    const v=(getText()||'').trim();
    if(!v){ ui.popup.style.display='none'; return; }
    const tpls=readTemplates();
    const candidates=tpls.flatMap(t=>(t.text||'').split(/\n+/).filter(Boolean));
    list=candidates.filter(s=>s.startsWith(v)&&s!==v).slice(0,10);

function createStore(initial){

/* =========================
   ìë™ì™„ì„± ë¡œì§ (ì ˆëŒ€ ë³€ê²½ ì—†ìŒ)
========================= */
function initAutoComplete(input, ui){
  if(!input||!ui) return;

  let list=[]; let sel=0;
  const getText=()=> input.value ?? input.innerText ?? '';
  const setText=t=>{ ('value' in input) ? (input.value=t) : (input.innerText=t); };

  const render=()=>{
    if(!list.length){ ui.popup.style.display='none'; return; }
    ui.popup.innerHTML = list.map((s,i)=>`<div class="ac-item ${i===sel?'sel':''}">${s}</div>`).join('');
    ui.popup.style.display='flex';
  };

  const onInput=()=>{
    const v=(getText()||'').trim();
    if(!v){ ui.popup.style.display='none'; return; }
    const tpls=readTemplates();
    const candidates=tpls.flatMap(t=>(t.text||'').split(/\n+/).filter(Boolean));
    list=candidates.filter(s=>s.startsWith(v)&&s!==v).slice(0,10);
    sel=0; render();
  };

  const onKeyDown=e=>{
    const v=(getText()||'');
    if(e.key==='Escape'){ ui.popup.style.display='none'; return; }
    if(ui.popup.style.display==='none') return;
    if(e.key==='ArrowDown'){ e.preventDefault(); sel=(sel+1)%list.length; render(); }
    else if(e.key==='ArrowUp'){ e.preventDefault(); sel=(sel-1+list.length)%list.length; render(); }
    else if(e.key==='Enter' || e.key==='Tab'){
      if(list.length){ e.preventDefault(); setText(list[sel]); ui.popup.style.display='none'; }
    }
  };

  input.addEventListener('input', onInput);
  input.addEventListener('keydown', onKeyDown);
}

/* =========================

========================= */
function boot(){
  const WRAP_SELECTORS=['.input_chat','#chat_write','#chatting_area .input_chat'];
  const INPUT_SELECTORS=['#write_area[contenteditable="true"]','#write_area[contenteditable]','div[contenteditable="true"]','[role="textbox"]','textarea'];
  const q=(sels,scope=document)=>{ for(const s of sels){ const el=scope.querySelector(s); if(el) return el; } return null; };

  let attached=false;
  const tryAttach=()=>{
    if(attached) return;
    const wrap=q(WRAP_SELECTORS, document) || document.body;
    const input=q(INPUT_SELECTORS, wrap) || q(INPUT_SELECTORS, document);
    if(!wrap || !input) return;

    const ui=mountUI(wrap);
    initAutoComplete(input, ui);  // â† ìë™ì™„ì„± ë¡œì§ ì—°ê²° (ë³€ê²½ ê¸ˆì§€)

    attached=true;
  };

  const poll=setInterval(()=>{ tryAttach(); if(attached) clearInterval(poll); }, 700);
  const mo=new MutationObserver(()=>tryAttach());
  mo.observe(document.documentElement, {childList:true,subtree:true});
  setTimeout(()=>clearInterval(poll), 20000);
}
boot();

(function() {

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {

      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

(function() {

  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');

	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;

#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;

	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== í”Œë«í¼ ê°ì§€ =====
  const isChzzk = location.hostname.includes('chzzk.naver.com');
  const isSoop = location.hostname.includes('sooplive.co.kr');

  if (! isChzzk && !isSoop) return;

  let WRAP_SELECTOR, INPUT_SELECTOR;
  
  if (isChzzk) {
    WRAP_SELECTOR = "div[class*=live_chatting_input_container]";
    INPUT_SELECTOR = "pre[contenteditable]";
    console.log('[CAC] Using Chzzk selectors');
  } else if (isSoop) {
    WRAP_SELECTOR = "#chat_write";

    console.log('[CAC] Using SOOP selectors');
  }

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2025.12.01',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${now.getFullYear()}${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')}.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader.readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  // ===== 3. CSS (ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) =====
  GM_addStyle(`

#autocomplete_popup {
	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);
	flex-direction: column;
	height: max-content;
	max-height: 150px;
	overflow: hidden scroll;
	z-index: 9;
	background: rgb(56,58,62);
	border-radius: 12px;
}
. autocomplete_item {
	padding: 8px 28px;
	line-height: normal;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_item:hover, .autocomplete_item.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_item:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
. autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button. left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button. selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

. autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane. right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(. 2,1,. 5,. 95);
	transition-duration: . 2s;
}

(function() {

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2025.12.01',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()). padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console.error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader.readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  // ===== 3. CSS =====

GM_addStyle(`
#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button. left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button. selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane. right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(. 2,1,. 5,. 95);
	transition-duration: . 2s;
}

(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  // ===== 3. CSS (ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) =====
  GM_addStyle(`
#backup-export-btn, #backup-import-btn {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
  border-radius: 6px;
  background: rgba(56,58,62,0.8);
  color: #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  user-select: none;
  transition: background 0.2s;
  font-weight: bold;
}
#backup-export-btn:hover, #backup-import-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(79,82,88,0.9);
}
#backup-export-btn:active, #backup-import-btn:active {
  background: rgba(91,94,101,0.9);
}
  `);

  // ===== 4. ë¶€íŒ… =====
  console.log('[CAC] Initializing with Backup/Restore feature.. .');
  addBackupButtonsToSettings();

    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console.error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  console.log('[CAC] Backup/Restore feature initialized');
