  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

.autocomplete_textarea {

	position: relative;

}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  // ===== 3. CSS (ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼) =====

}

}
#backup-export-btn:active, #backup-import-btn:active {
  background: rgba(91,94,101,0.9);
}
  `);

  // ===== 4. ë¶€íŒ… =====
  console.log('[CAC] Initializing with Backup/Restore feature.. .');
  addBackupButtonsToSettings();

	display: flex;
	position: absolute;

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

  function exportBackup() {

    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now. getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');

    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);

    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (!  backup.templates || ! backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console.  error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader.  readAsText(file);
    });
  }

        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);

      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';

      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼

      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.  type = 'file';

(function() {

  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${now.getFullYear()}${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')}.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane. appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  border: 0.8px solid rgba(115, 119, 127, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 6px;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255) ! important;
  cursor: pointer;
  user-select: none;
  transition: background 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.2, 1, 0.5, 0.95);
  font-weight: bold;
}

#backup-export-btn:hover, #backup-import-btn:hover {
  background: rgb(79, 82, 88) !important;
}

#backup-export-btn:active, #backup-import-btn:active {
  background: rgb(91, 94, 101) !important;
}

.autocomplete_pane {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  gap: 8px;
  flex-direction: column;
  overflow-y: scroll;
}

.autocomplete_pane. right_pane {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  outline: none;
  border: 2px solid rgb(115, 119, 127) !important;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  line-height: normal;
  align-items: center;
  background: rgb(21, 22, 25) !important;
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;
  cursor: text;
}

.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
  background: rgb(33, 34, 37) !important;
}

.autocomplete_input:hover {
  border-color: rgb(140, 145, 155) !important;
}

. autocomplete_input:focus {
  border-color: rgb(167, 171, 180) !important;
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  outline: none;
  border: 2px solid rgb(115, 119, 127) !important;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  line-height: normal;
  align-items: center;
  background: rgb(21, 22, 25) !important;
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;
  cursor: text;
}

.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
  background: rgb(33, 34, 37) !important;
}

.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
  border-color: rgb(140, 145, 155) !important;
}

.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
  border-color: rgb(167, 171, 180) !important;
}

.transition {
  transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.2, 1, 0.5, 0.95);
  transition-duration: 0.2s;
}

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.  type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane. appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;

	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;

.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${now.getFullYear()}${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')}.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console.error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (! settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (! leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now. getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (!  backup.templates || ! backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.  setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates.  length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.  `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console.  error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader.  readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.  type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane. appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

#autocomplete_popup {
	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);

	height: max-content;
	max-height: 150px;
	overflow: hidden scroll;
	z-index: 9;
	background: rgb(56,58,62);
	border-radius: 12px;
}

	padding: 8px 28px;
	line-height: normal;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}

	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_item:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

  function exportBackup() {

    const backup = {

      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${now.getFullYear()}${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')}.json`;

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');

          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console.error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (! settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('. autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');

      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);

	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;

	padding: 8px 28px;

	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;

}

	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button. left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button. selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
. autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

. autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane. right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(. 2,1,. 5,. 95);
	transition-duration: . 2s;
}

(function() {
  'use strict';

   // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;

	padding: 8px 28px;

	-webkit-user-select: none;

	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

    const now = new Date();

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);

  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {

      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {

    }, 500);

  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${now.getFullYear()}${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')}.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });

          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {

      if (!settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      // âœ… ìˆ˜ì •: ê³µë°± ì œê±°
      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (! leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');

      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);

#autocomplete_popup .autocomplete_item:active {

/* ì„œë¸Œí…ìŠ¤íŠ¸ */
. autocomplete_subtext {

/* ì„¤ì • UI ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ */
#autocomplete_settings {
  display: none !important;
  position: fixed !important;
  top: 32px !important;
  bottom: 32px !important;
  left: 32px !important;
  right: 32px !important;
  overflow-y: scroll !important;
  padding: 24px !important;
  gap: 24px !important;
  background: rgba(56, 58, 62, 0.875) !important;
  border: 1px solid rgba(115, 119, 127, 0.75) !important;
  border-radius: 12px !important;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px) !important;
  z-index: 99999 !important;
  flex-direction: column !important;
}

#autocomplete_settings.opened {
  display: flex !important;
}

/* âœ… ì„¤ì • UI ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ë°” (í•­ìƒ ìˆ¨ê¹€) */

  width: 0 !important;
  height: 0 !important;
}

#autocomplete_settings::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  display: none !important;
}

#autocomplete_settings::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  display: none !important;
}

/* ë²„íŠ¼ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ */

(function() {

  function exportBackup() {

    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',

      templates: templates,

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${now.getFullYear()}${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')}.json`;

  function importBackup(file) {

      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);

      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  function exportBackup() {

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',

      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;

    document.body.appendChild(link);

    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {

    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°

#autocomplete_popup {
	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);

	height: max-content;
	max-height: 150px;
	overflow: hidden scroll;
	z-index: 9;
	background: rgb(56,58,62);
	border-radius: 12px;
}
.autocomplete_item {
	padding: 8px 28px;
	line-height: normal;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}

	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_item:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

// ===== ì„¤ì • UI ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ + í°íŠ¸ ê°•ì œ ì ìš© =====
const applySettingsStyle = () => {
  const settingsElm = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
  if (settingsElm) {
    // ì„¤ì • UI ê¸°ë³¸ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼
    settingsElm.style.display = settingsElm.classList.contains('opened') ? 'flex' : 'none';
    settingsElm.style.position = 'fixed';
    settingsElm.style.top = '32px';
    settingsElm.style.bottom = '32px';
    settingsElm. style.left = '32px';
    settingsElm.style.right = '32px';
    settingsElm.style. overflowY = 'scroll';
    settingsElm.style.padding = '24px';
    settingsElm.style. gap = '24px';
    settingsElm.style.background = 'rgba(56, 58, 62, 0. 875)';
    settingsElm. style.border = '1px solid rgba(115, 119, 127, 0.75)';
    settingsElm.style.borderRadius = '12px';
    settingsElm.style.backdropFilter = 'blur(4px)';
    settingsElm.style.zIndex = '99999';
    settingsElm.style.fontFamily = '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif';

    // ì„¤ì • UI ë‚´ë¶€ ëª¨ë“  ìš”ì†Œ í°íŠ¸
    const allElements = settingsElm.querySelectorAll('*');
    allElements. forEach(element => {
      element.style.fontFamily = '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif';
    });
  }
};

// ===== SOOP font-family ê°•ì œ ì ìš© =====
const applyFontFix = () => {
  // 1ï¸âƒ£ íŒì—… í°íŠ¸
  const items = document.querySelectorAll('#autocomplete_popup . autocomplete_item');
  items.forEach(item => {
    item.style.fontFamily = '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif';
    item.style.fontSize = '14px';
    item.style. color = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)';
  });

  // 2ï¸âƒ£ ì„¤ì • UI ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ + í°íŠ¸
  applySettingsStyle();
};

// íŒì—…ë§Œ ê°ì‹œ
const popupContainer = document.getElementById('autocomplete_popup');
if (popupContainer) {
  const observer = new MutationObserver(() => {
    applyFontFix();
  });
  observer.observe(popupContainer, { childList: true, subtree: true });
}

  function importBackup(file) {

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);

      };

      reader. readAsText(file);

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)

      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);

const applySettingsStyle = () => {

    settingsElm.style.right = '32px';
    settingsElm.style.overflowY = 'scroll';
    settingsElm. style.padding = '24px';

    settingsElm.style.background = 'rgba(56, 58, 62, 0.875)';
    settingsElm.style.border = '1px solid rgba(115, 119, 127, 0.75)';
    settingsElm.style.borderRadius = '12px';
    settingsElm.style.backdropFilter = 'blur(4px)';

    // ì„¤ì • UI ë‚´ë¶€ ëª¨ë“  ìš”ì†Œ í°íŠ¸

const applyFontFix = () => {

  const items = document.querySelectorAll('#autocomplete_popup .autocomplete_item');
  items.forEach(item => {
    item.style.fontFamily = '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif';
    item.style.fontSize = '14px';

  // 2ï¸âƒ£ ì„¤ì • UI ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ + í°íŠ¸

};

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

(function() {

 // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}
