(function() {
  'use strict';

  // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()). padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

(function() {

  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()). padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn. id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput. accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

#autocomplete_popup {
	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);

	height: max-content;
	max-height: 150px;
	overflow: hidden scroll;
	z-index: 9;
	background: rgb(56,58,62);
	border-radius: 12px;
}

	padding: 8px 28px;
	line-height: normal;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}

	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_item:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

  function importBackup(file) {

#autocomplete_popup {
	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);

	height: max-content;
	max-height: 150px;
	overflow: hidden scroll;
	z-index: 9;

	border-radius: 12px;
}
.autocomplete_item {
	padding: 8px 28px;
	line-height: normal;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_item:hover, .autocomplete_item.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_item:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${now.getFullYear()}${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')}.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates.length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader.readAsText(file);
    });
  }

#autocomplete_popup {
	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);
	flex-direction: column;
	height: max-content;
	max-height: 150px;
	overflow: hidden scroll;
	z-index: 9;
	background: rgb(56,58,62);
	border-radius: 12px;
}
. autocomplete_item {
	padding: 8px 28px;
	line-height: normal;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_item:hover, .autocomplete_item.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_item:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);

	height: max-content;
	max-height: 150px;

	border-radius: 12px;

	padding: 8px 28px;
	line-height: normal;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: pre-wrap;

	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}

	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}

	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}

	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

  function exportBackup() {

    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${now.getFullYear()}${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')}-${String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')}.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates.length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);

      };

    });

#autocomplete_popup {
	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);
	flex-direction: column;
	height: max-content;
	max-height: 150px;
	overflow: hidden scroll;
	z-index: 9;
	background: rgb(56,58,62);
	border-radius: 12px;
}
.autocomplete_item {
	padding: 8px 28px;
	line-height: normal;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: pre-wrap;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_item:hover, .autocomplete_item.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_item:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

(function() {
  'use strict';

    // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  // ===== 2. CSS (íŒì—…ë§Œ) =====
  GM_addStyle(`
#autocomplete_popup {
  display: flex;
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 48px;
  width: calc(100% - 10px);
  flex-direction: column;
  height: max-content;
  max-height: 150px;
  overflow: hidden scroll ! important;
  z-index: 9;
  background: rgb(56, 58, 62) !important;
  border: 0px none ! important;
  border-radius: 12px;
}

html #autocomplete_popup . autocomplete_item {
  padding: 8px 28px;
  line-height: normal;
  word-break: keep-all;
  white-space: pre-wrap;
  cursor: pointer;
  user-select: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  font-size: 14px ! important;
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif ! important;
}

#autocomplete_popup .autocomplete_item:hover,
#autocomplete_popup .autocomplete_item.selected {
  background: rgb(79, 82, 88) !important;
}

#autocomplete_popup .autocomplete_item:active {
  background: rgb(91, 94, 101) !important;
}

. autocomplete_subtext {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
  font-size: 12px !important;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif ! important;
}

.autocomplete_button {
  display: flex;
  flex-shrink: 0;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border: 0. 8px solid rgba(115, 119, 127, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 6px;
  line-height: normal;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  word-break: keep-all;
  white-space: nowrap;
  overflow: hidden;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  cursor: pointer;
  user-select: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;

  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !important;
  transition: background 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.2, 1, 0.5, 0.95);
}

.autocomplete_button:hover,
.autocomplete_button.selected {
  background: rgb(79, 82, 88) ! important;
}

.autocomplete_button:active {

}

.autocomplete_button.left {

}

#backup-export-btn,
#backup-import-btn {
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border: 0.8px solid rgba(115, 119, 127, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 6px;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255) ! important;
  cursor: pointer;
  user-select: none;
  transition: background 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.2, 1, 0.5, 0.95);
  font-weight: bold;
}

#backup-export-btn:hover,
#backup-import-btn:hover {
  background: rgb(79, 82, 88) !important;
}

#backup-export-btn:active,
#backup-import-btn:active {
  background: rgb(91, 94, 101) !important;
}

. transition {
  transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.2, 1, 0.5, 0.95);
  transition-duration: 0.2s;
}
  `);

 // ===== SOOP font-family ê°•ì œ ì ìš© =====
const applyFontFix = () => {
  const items = document.querySelectorAll('#autocomplete_popup .autocomplete_item');
  items.forEach(item => {
    item.style.fontFamily = '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif';
    item.style.fontSize = '14px';
    item.style.color = 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)';
  });
};

// ìš”ì†Œê°€ ìƒì„±/ë³€ê²½ë  ë•Œë§ˆë‹¤ ì ìš©

  applyFontFix();
});

observer.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

const enforceRightPaneStyles = () => {

  rightPane. querySelectorAll('div:not(input):not(button)'). forEach(div => {

};

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}
const applyRightPaneStyles = () => {
  const rightPane = document.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.right_pane');
  if (!rightPane) return;
  
  // Apply inline styles to inputs, divs, buttons
  rightPane.querySelectorAll('input').forEach(input => {
    input.style.backgroundColor = 'rgb(21, 22, 25)';
    // ...
  });
};
.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

(function() {

  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac. templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now. getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader.readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane. left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

  padding: 24px;
  gap: 24px;
  background: rgba(56, 58, 62, 0.875);
  border: 1px solid rgb(115, 119, 127, 0.75);
  border-radius: 12px;
  backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
  z-index: 99999;
}

#autocomplete_settings.opened {
  display: flex;
}

. autocomplete_pane {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  gap: 8px;
  flex-direction: column;
  overflow-y: scroll;
}

.autocomplete_pane.left_pane {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  outline: none;
  border: 2px solid rgb(115, 119, 127);
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  line-height: normal;
  align-items: center;
  background: rgb(21, 22, 25);
  color: white;
  cursor: text;
}

.autocomplete_input:hover,
.autocomplete_input:focus {
  background: rgb(33, 34, 37);
}

.autocomplete_input:hover {
  border-color: rgb(140, 145, 155);
}

.autocomplete_input:focus {
  border-color: rgb(167, 171, 180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
  display: flex;
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  outline: none;
  border: 2px solid rgb(115, 119, 127);
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  line-height: normal;
  align-items: center;
  background: rgb(21, 22, 25);
  color: white;
  cursor: text;
}

. autocomplete_textarea:hover,
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
  background: rgb(33, 34, 37);
}

.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
  border-color: rgb(140, 145, 155);
}

.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
  border-color: rgb(167, 171, 180);
}

/* === ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ ë¶€ë¶„ (right_pane) INPUT ìš”ì†Œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ === */
.autocomplete_pane. right_pane input {
  background-color: rgb(21, 22, 25) !important;
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;
  border: 1. 6px solid rgb(115, 119, 127) !important;
  border-radius: 8px !important;
  padding: 12px 16px !important;
  font-size: 14px !important;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !important;
  width: 100% !important;
  box-sizing: border-box !important;
}

. autocomplete_pane.right_pane input:hover {
  background-color: rgb(33, 34, 37) !important;
  border-color: rgb(140, 145, 155) !important;
}

.autocomplete_pane.right_pane input:focus {
  background-color: rgb(33, 34, 37) ! important;
  border-color: rgb(167, 171, 180) !important;
}

/* === ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ ë¶€ë¶„ (right_pane) DIV ë¼ë²¨ ìš”ì†Œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ === */
.autocomplete_pane. right_pane > div:not(input):not(button) {
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;
  font-size: 14px ! important;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !important;
  font-weight: 400 !important;
  padding: 0px ! important;
  margin: 0px !important;
  line-height: 16. 8px !important;
}

/* === ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ ë¶€ë¶„ (right_pane) BUTTON ìš”ì†Œ ìŠ¤íƒ€ì¼ === */
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane button {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) !important;
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important;
  border: 0.8px solid rgba(115, 119, 127, 0.5) !important;
  border-radius: 6px ! important;
  padding: 12px 24px !important;
  font-size: 14px !important;
  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Malgun Gothic", "ë§‘ì€ ê³ ë”•", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif !important;

}

}

// ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ë°” ì»¤ìŠ¤í…€ í•¨ìˆ˜
function createCustomScrollbar(element) {
  if (!element || !element.scrollHeight > element.clientHeight) return;
  
  // ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ë°” íŠ¸ë™ ìƒì„±
  const track = document.createElement('div');
  track.style.cssText = `
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 8px;
    height: 100%;
    background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);
  `;
  
  // ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ë°” thumb ìƒì„±
  const thumb = document.createElement('div');
  thumb.style.cssText = `
    position: absolute;
    width: 8px;
    background: rgb(115, 119, 127);
    border-radius: 4px;
    cursor: pointer;
  `;
  
  track.appendChild(thumb);
  element.style.position = 'relative';
  element.appendChild(track);
  
  // ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ ì´ë²¤íŠ¸ ì—°ê²°
  element.addEventListener('scroll', () => {
    const scrollPercent = element.scrollTop / (element.scrollHeight - element.clientHeight);
    const thumbHeight = (element.clientHeight / element.scrollHeight) * element.clientHeight;
    thumb.style.height = thumbHeight + 'px';
    thumb.style.top = (scrollPercent * (element.clientHeight - thumbHeight)) + 'px';
  });
}

// ì ìš©
const pane = document.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane');
if (pane) {

```javascript
// SOOP ì½˜ì†”ì—ì„œ:         

const style = document.createElement('style');

style.textContent = `
#autocomplete_popup {
  scrollbar-color:  #9f9f9f #2c2c2c;
}

#autocomplete_settings {
  scrollbar-color:  #9f9f9f #2c2c2c;
}

. autocomplete_pane {
  scrollbar-color:  #9f9f9f #2c2c2c;
}
`;

document.head.appendChild(style);

// ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ë°” thumbì—ë§Œ ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ ë°˜ì‘
const applyScrollbarThumbHover = () => {
  const elements = [
    document.getElementById('autocomplete_popup'),
    document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings'),
    ... document.querySelectorAll('.autocomplete_pane')
  ];

  elements.forEach(el => {
    if (! el) return;

    // ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ MOVE - thumb ê°ì§€
    el.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
      const scrollbarWidth = 12;
      const elementRect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
      const mouseX = e.clientX;
      const scrollHeight = el.scrollHeight;
      const clientHeight = el.clientHeight;
      const scrollTop = el.scrollTop;
      const mouseY = e.clientY - elementRect.top;

      // ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ë°” ì˜¤ë¥¸ìª½ ëì— ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ê°€ ìˆëŠ”ì§€
      if (mouseX > (elementRect.right - scrollbarWidth)) {
        // thumb ë†’ì´ ê³„ì‚°
        const thumbHeight = (clientHeight / scrollHeight) * clientHeight;
        const thumbTop = (scrollTop / scrollHeight) * clientHeight;

        // thumb ì˜ì—­ì¸ì§€ í™•ì¸ (í™”ì‚´í‘œ ì œì™¸)
        if (mouseY > thumbTop && mouseY < (thumbTop + thumbHeight) && 
            mouseY > 14 && mouseY < (clientHeight - 14)) {
          el.style.scrollbarColor = '#d1d1d1 #2c2c2c';
        } else {
          el.style.scrollbarColor = '#9f9f9f #2c2c2c';
        }
      }
    });

    // ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ LEAVE - ìƒ‰ ë³µêµ¬
    el.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
      el.style.scrollbarColor = '#9f9f9f #2c2c2c';
    });
  });

  console.log('âœ… ìŠ¤í¬ë¡¤ë°” thumbë§Œ ê°ì§€ ì™„ë£Œ!');
};

applyScrollbarThumbHover();

// DOM ë³€ê²½ ê°ì‹œ
const observer = new MutationObserver(() => {
  applyScrollbarThumbHover();
});

observer.observe(document.body, {
  childList: true,
  subtree: true
});
```

(function() {

    // ===== 1. ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ìœ í‹¸ =====
  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage. setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates. length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console. error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader. readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {
    const checkAndAddButtons = setInterval(() => {
      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput. type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {
          try {
            await importBackup(file);
            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)
            setTimeout(() => location.reload(), 1000);
          } catch (err) {
            console.error('[CAC] Import failed:', err);
          }
        }
      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

      clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
    }, 500);

    // 20ì´ˆ í›„ í¬ê¸°
    setTimeout(() => clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons), 20000);
  }

	display: flex;
	position: absolute;
	bottom: 48px;
	width: calc(100% - 10px);

	border-radius: 12px;

	padding: 8px 28px;

	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;

}

	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}

  function exportBackup() {
    const templates = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.templates') || '[]');
    const settings = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ac.settings') || '{}');

    const backup = {
      version: '2024.12.22',
      exportDate: new Date().toISOString(),
      templates: templates,
      settings: settings
    };

    const dataStr = JSON.stringify(backup, null, 2);
    const dataBlob = new Blob([dataStr], { type: 'application/json' });
    const url = URL.createObjectURL(dataBlob);

    const now = new Date();
    const filename = `cac-backup-${
      now.getFullYear()
    }${String(now.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getDate()).padStart(2, '0')
    }-${
      String(now.getHours()).padStart(2, '0')
    }${String(now.getMinutes()).padStart(2, '0')}${
      String(now.getSeconds()).padStart(2, '0')
    }.json`;

    const link = document.createElement('a');
    link.href = url;
    link.download = filename;
    document.body.appendChild(link);
    link.click();
    document.body.removeChild(link);
    URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

    console.log(`[CAC] Backup exported: ${filename}`);
    alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì´ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: ${filename}`);
  }

  function importBackup(file) {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      const reader = new FileReader();

      reader.onload = (e) => {
        try {
          const backup = JSON.parse(e.target.result);

          if (! backup.templates || !backup.settings) {
            throw new Error('Invalid backup file format');
          }

          // ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ì €ì¥
          localStorage.setItem('ac.templates', JSON.stringify(backup.templates));
          localStorage.setItem('ac.settings', JSON.stringify(backup.settings));

          console.log('[CAC] Backup restored successfully');
          alert(`âœ… ë°±ì—…ì´ ë³µì›ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤!\ní…œí”Œë¦¿: ${backup.templates.length}ê°œ\nì„¤ì •ì´ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. `);

          resolve({ success: true, backup });
        } catch (error) {
          console.error('[CAC] Import error:', error);
          alert(`âŒ ë°±ì—… íŒŒì¼ì„ ì½ì„ ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤:\n${error.message}`);
          reject(error);
        }
      };

      reader.onerror = (e) => {
        console.error('[CAC] File read error:', e);
        reject(e);
      };

      reader.readAsText(file);
    });
  }

  // ===== 2. ì„¤ì • íŒì—…ì— ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì¶”ê°€ =====
  function addBackupButtonsToSettings() {

      const settingsModal = document.getElementById('autocomplete_settings');
      if (!settingsModal) return;

      // ì´ë¯¸ ë°±ì—… ë²„íŠ¼ì´ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ ìŠ¤í‚µ
      if (document.getElementById('backup-export-btn')) {
        clearInterval(checkAndAddButtons);
        return;
      }

      const leftPane = settingsModal.querySelector('.autocomplete_pane.left_pane');
      if (!leftPane) return;

      // ë°±ì—…/ë³µì› ë²„íŠ¼ ì»¨í…Œì´ë„ˆ
      const backupContainer = document.createElement('div');
      backupContainer.style.cssText = 'display:flex;gap:8px;margin-top:16px;border-top:1px solid rgba(115,119,127,0.3);padding-top:16px;';

      // ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const exportBtn = document.createElement('button');
      exportBtn.id = 'backup-export-btn';
      exportBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      exportBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ’¾ ë°±ì—… ë‚´ë³´ë‚´ê¸°';
      exportBtn.onclick = exportBackup;
      exportBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸° ë²„íŠ¼
      const importBtn = document.createElement('button');
      importBtn.id = 'backup-import-btn';
      importBtn.className = 'autocomplete_button';
      importBtn.textContent = 'ğŸ“‚ ë°±ì—… ë¶ˆëŸ¬ì˜¤ê¸°';
      importBtn.style.flex = '1';

      // ìˆ¨ê²¨ì§„ íŒŒì¼ ì…ë ¥
      const fileInput = document.createElement('input');
      fileInput.type = 'file';
      fileInput.accept = '.json';
      fileInput.style.display = 'none';
      fileInput.onchange = async (e) => {
        const file = e.target.files[0];
        if (file) {

            // í˜ì´ì§€ ìƒˆë¡œê³ ì¹¨ (ìƒˆ ë°ì´í„° ë°˜ì˜)

      };

      importBtn.onclick = () => fileInput.click();

      backupContainer.append(exportBtn, importBtn, fileInput);
      leftPane.appendChild(backupContainer);

    }, 500);

#autocomplete_settings {
	display: none;
	position: fixed;
	top: 32px;
	bottom: 32px;
	left: 32px;
	right: 32px;
	overflow-y: scroll;
	padding: 24px;
	gap: 24px;
	background: rgba(56,58,62,0.875);
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.75);
	border-radius: 12px;
	backdrop-filter: blur(4px);
	z-index: 99999;
}
#autocomplete_settings.opened {
	display: flex;
}
.autocomplete_button {
	display: flex;
	flex-shrink: 0;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border: 1px solid rgb(115,119,127,0.5);
	border-radius: 6px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	justify-content: center;
	word-break: keep-all;
	white-space: nowrap;
	overflow: hidden;
	text-overflow: ellipsis;
	cursor: pointer;
	user-select: none;
	-webkit-user-select: none;
}
.autocomplete_button.left {
	justify-content: flex-start;
}
.autocomplete_button:hover, .autocomplete_button.selected {
	background: rgb(79,82,88);
}
.autocomplete_button:active {
	background: rgb(91,94,101);
}
.autocomplete_subtext {
	color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);
}

.autocomplete_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	gap: 8px;
	flex-direction: column;
	overflow-y: scroll;
}
.autocomplete_pane.right_pane {
	display: flex;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	flex-direction: column;
}

.autocomplete_input {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_input:hover, .autocomplete_input:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_input:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_input:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.autocomplete_textarea {
	display: flex;
	position: relative;
	width: 100%;
	height: 100%;
	margin: 0;
	outline: none;
	border: 2px solid rgb(115,119,127);
	border-radius: 8px;
	padding: 12px 16px;
	line-height: normal;
	align-items: center;
	background: rgb(21,22,25);
	color: white;
	cursor: text;
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover, .autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	background: rgb(33,34,37);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:hover {
	border-color: rgb(140,145,155);
}
.autocomplete_textarea:focus {
	border-color: rgb(167,171,180);
}

.transition {
	transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
	transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(.2,1,.5,.95);
	transition-duration: .2s;
}
